SEARCH:
Package model

Klasse Login

java.lang.Object
model.Login
public class Login extends Object
Represents a login entry for a user in the system. Stores the user's username, password hash, and permissions.

    • Login

      public Login(long uid, long cid, String username, String passwordHash, int permissions)
      Constructs a Login object with the given parameters.
      Parameter:
      uid - The user ID.
      cid - The caregiver ID.
      username - The username.
      passwordHash - The password hash.
      permissions - The user permissions.

    • Login

      public Login(long cid, String username, String upass, int permissions)
      Constructs a Login object with the given parameters. Generates the password hash based on the provided password.
      Parameter:
      cid - The caregiver ID.
      username - The username.
      upass - The password.
      permissions - The user permissions.

      private static String generatePasswordHash(String password)

      Gibt zurück:

    • validatePassword

      public static boolean validatePassword(String originalPassword, String storedPassword)
      Validates the provided password against the stored password hash.
      Parameter:
      originalPassword - The original password.
      storedPassword - The stored password hash.
      Gibt zurück:
      True if the passwords match, false otherwise.

    • fromHex

      private static byte[] fromHex(String hex) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Converts a hexadecimal string to a byte array.
      Parameter:
      hex - The hexadecimal string.
      Gibt zurück:
      The byte array.
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the SHA1 algorithm is not available.
